name: mm-gallery
description: A fully-styled, image gallery with thumbnail slider & enlarged image view.

attributes.name: data
attributes.description: The array of data with configurations for image sources & caption for gallery.

methods.name: _slideLeft
methods.description: Slides thumbnail images within the slider to the left.

methods.name: _slideRight
methods.description: Slides thumbnail images within the slider to the right.

methods.name: _handleActiveClass
methods.description: Handles the active/inactive behavior on click of thumbnail image.

methods.name: _updateClass
methods.description: Updates the image element class based on index.

methods.name: _checkIfEmpty
methods.description: Performs a check to see if the value passed is null/undefined.
